title: Renovated 3 Bed (2 KING SIZE!) w/ Dishwasher + FREE Laundry + Storage!

posting_body: ['Gorgeous 3 Bed (2 KING SIZE!)', 'w/ Dishwasher + FREE Laundry + Storage available in Bedstuy, short walk from the J/Z train lines.', 'The surrounding area is home to many corner cafes, coffee shops, cool bars, great restaurants, and organic grocery stores!', 'Key features:', '- Spacious Living Room w/ Glass Doors + Dining area', '- Beautiful kitchen with Stainless Steel Appliances + Dishwasher', '- 3 Queen-King Size Bedrooms', '- 1 Gorgeous Bathroom w/ Stand Up Shower', '- Exposed Brick', '- High Ceilings & Hardwood Floors throughout', '- Central AC/Heat', '- FREE Laundry in Building', '- Storage space available in Basement!', 'Move in =', 'First Month’s', 'Rent $3100 + Security Deposit $3100 + Broker’s Fee $3100', 'Contact me today before it’s gone!', 'Mike B. 831-585-0112', '( New Development) +', 'King and Queen size bedrooms']
